Loan Inquiry.Interest Rate: Extract the mentioned interest rate percentage.

Loan Modification.New Payment: Extract the new monthly payment amount.
Loan Modification.Effective Date: Extract the date from when the new payment applies.

Loan Inquiry > Prepayment.Prepayment Penalty: Extract if there is a penalty for prepayment.
Loan Inquiry > Prepayment.Remaining Balance: Extract the remaining loan balance amount.

Loan Closing.Closing Date: Extract the date for loan closing.
Loan Closing.Final Amount Due: Extract the final payment amount required to close the loan.
